mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_select AS s INNER JOIN t_course AS c ON s.`courseid` = c.id INNER JOIN t_teachers AS t ON c.`teacherid`=t.`teacherid` WHERE s.`studentid`=#{studentId}
SELECT * FROM t_course WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT courseid AS id FROM t_select WHERE studentid=#{studentId});
SELECT * FROM t_course WHERE id IN (SELECT courseid AS id FROM t_select WHERE studentid=#{studentId});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_select WHERE studentid=#{studentId} AND courseid=#{courseId};
